patthana8.60:4.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.60:5.1: Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.60:6.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.60:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
